rules_text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it and it gains haste until end of turn.
Homestead {1}{R} [i]({1}{R}: Exile this card from your hand as a sorcery. Cast it on a later turn by tapping untapped creatures you control with total power greater than or equal to its mana value.)[/i]
